title: Police arrest fourth suspect in death of 7-year-old girl
content:
SAN ANTONIO - San Antonio police arrested a fourth suspect in connection with the shooting death of Iris Rodriguez.
Hours after releasing his identity Friday night, police arrested Peter Louis Gonzalez, 22.
Police said Gonzalez turned himself in after police announced he was wanted in the death of 7-year-old Rodriguez.
Rodriguez was shot and killed on June 1 while walking with her mother on the city’s West Side.
Her mother survived and is recovering from her injuries.
Gonzalez faces capital murder charges along with two counts of aggravated assault.
In the weeks since little Iris was killed, police have arrested three other men and charged them with murder.
